net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_AE2_upgradeActions
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
To be executed against a token in the event its AE2 actions require some udpate action
This macro will compare the current Token's AE2 action version with AE2 and perform upgraded
for each version differential, should it be required. This allows this macro to organically
grow as new model versions evolve.
